title: Mega Powers
description: Mega pack that includes 20 AAA high-quality power abilities
longDescription:
Try Before You Buy Playable Demo

Check Documentation

Watch Showcase

Integration Tutorial

Discord Support Channel


The Mega Powers project provides a simple plug-and-play that takes less than 3 minutes! The pack brings up to 20 high-end abilities with a health bar system and mana to spend on every power ability.

The pack contains complex systems with easy integration and multiple options for changes to have a wide variety of effects that can be achieved.

The power abilities include close-range, long-range, and radial damage with magic, telekinetic, physical, and gravity effects.


If there will be 🔥 >>> 10 reviews <<< 🔥 we will make a free update!


Included additional nice-to-have features:

  • Mana system with the option to enable/disable at any time
  • Pickup that restores part of the mana
  • Pickup that increases max mana
  • Enemy health system with the option to enable/disable at any time
  • If using a health system, a damage system is enable
  • Directional hit effect when damage system enabled
  • Camera effects
  • Ragdoll + optimization
  • Notifications
  • Multiple options to setup
  • Super easy integration - plug and play (approximate 3 min)
  • Support UE4 & UE5 default skeletons
  • Actors spawner in random location-based sphere
  • Actors spawner with 2D loop
  • AI spawner with movement in a random location-based sphere


Check our other products here Unreal Marketplace
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 100% Blueprint
  • Sandbox for testing


Telekinesis:

  • Single AI/object push
  • Multiple AIs/objects push
  • Pull and push a single AI/object
  • Pull and push multiple AIs/objects
  • Objects after the ability can collide with AIs and kill them


Physics:

  • Ground slam against AIs/objects
  • Sparta Kick against AI/object
  • Objects after the ability can collide with AIs and kill them
  • Speedster attack
  • Auto ground slam when falling from a height


Range:

  • Lazer from eyes
  • Controlled wrecking ball
  • Fireball


Radial:

  • Shrapnel grenade
  • Magnet grenade
  • Spear rain
  • Arrow rain
  • Small meteor rain
  • Big meteor rain
  • Multiple fireballs


Gravity:

  • Black hole void
  • Black hole with suction
  • Controlled black hole

Â 

Number of Blueprints: 56

Number of Widgets: 6

Number of Animations: 16

Number of Particles: 12

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PlayStation, Xbox, Android, IOS

Documentation: Documentation

Important/Additional Notes: The damage system is supported only on a Single AI push, Sparta Kick against AI, Fireball, and Multiple fireballs. Other power abilities have a health system and damage support, but the health is removed from the first attack attempt.
